question: You want to hold a surprise party for a friend who is visiting his home town after a long time from a foreign country. Write a letter to a common friend asking for his help in organizing the party and in your letter:Write the reasons for organizing the partyDescribe when, where and how you would be organizing the partyAsk your friend to meet you in person for further discussions
text: How are you, man? How's it going? Long time, no see, huh. I hope you're doing well.

I am writing this letter to tell you that our best buddy, Mohit, is returning to India after completing his 5-year project and I am planning to give him a surprise homecoming party as he would have missed our traditional Indian cuisine. I can't wait to meet him.I want you to please help me organise this party.

I have finalised the venue. We will be having a party at my farmhouse just outside my house on the upcoming weekend. I want you to please take care of the decorations while I will be handling the catering services. Also, send the invitation to his family.
At last, meet me on a Saturday morning I will explain to you more information about the party.We will have such a blast at this reunion.
